overview:
Don Shapleigh has more than 35 years experience as a banker and financial services professional in the Atlanta marketplace.

He was an Executive Vice President and Regional President of Crescent Bank (now Renasant Bank), and a founding Director and Executive Officer of Futurus Bank. He also served as an Executive Officer and Director of Directo, Inc, a financial services company in Norcross, Georgia. Prior to Directo, Don co-founded, and was a Director of NetBank and NetBank, Inc. Earlier in his career, he was an executive officer for SouthTrust Bank and Bank South, N.A. in Atlanta.

Don has been active with the Georgia Bankers Association, the United Way, Habitat for Humanity, Little League Baseball and the Sewanee Alumni Association.

A graduate of The University of the South with a BA in Economics, Don also earned a Masters in Banking from the Louisiana State University School of Banking. He is from Camden, SC.
